headers.subject: [tosdr:2315] Yahoo! deletes your data 90 days after account termination

html:
• If you ask Yahoo! to delete your Yahoo! account, in most cases your account will be deactivated and then deleted from our user registration database in approximately 90 days. This delay is necessary to discourage users from engaging in fraudulent activity.

http://info.yahoo.com/privacy/us/yahoo/datastorage/ 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Yahoo! deletes your data 90 days after account termination
text:
>
>
>    - If you ask Yahoo! to delete your Yahoo! account, in most cases your 
>    account will be deactivated and then deleted from our user registration 
>    database in approximately 90 days. This delay is necessary to discourage 
>    users from engaging in fraudulent activity.
>
>
http://info.yahoo.com/privacy/us/yahoo/datastorage/ 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
